thread.title: Lucknam Park, Bath, appoints Andrew McPherson as General Manager
thread.title_full: Lucknam Park, Bath, appoints Andrew McPherson as General Manager

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Lucknam Park, Bath, appoints Andrew McPherson as General Manager
text:
Lucknam Park, Bath, appoints Andrew McPherson as General Manager Lucknam Park, Bath, appoints Andrew McPherson as General Manager Details   10:45 Lucknam Park, Bath, has announced the appointment of Andrew McPherson as General Manager. Andrew Mcpherson, aged 46, joins Lucknam Park with a wealth of experience from his 20-year career across the hotel industry. 
His previous roles include General Manager at Holbeck Ghyll Hotel, Lake District, Swinton Park, North Yorkshire and Skibo Castle, Scotland. Claire Randall, Managing Director, Lucknam Park said “I am delighted to welcome Andrew to my team, his extensive knowledge and experience in all aspects of hotel operations will help Lucknam Park to continue to achieve the highest standards.” Related articles
